lyrics:
[Intro]
(Music: Bright, happy, and slow acoustic pop, perfect for kids)

Hello, hello, hello!
Let’s sing together!

[Verse 1: Eye]
(Singer's voice is very clear, friendly, and encouraging)
Ready for the first word?
(첫 번째 단어 준비됐나요?)

Eye. Eye.
눈. 눈. (nun. nun.)
... (short musical pause)

Let's sing it again!
(다시 한번 불러봐요!)

Eye. Eye.
눈. 눈. (nun. nun.)

Wow! Great job!
(와! 정말 잘했어요!)

[Verse 2: Nose]
(The happy melody continues)
Ready for the next word?
(다음 단어 준비됐나요?)

Nose. Nose.
코. 코. (ko. ko.)
... (short musical pause)

Let's sing it again!
(다시 한번 불러봐요!)

Nose. Nose.
코. 코. (ko. ko.)

Wow! You're a star!
(와! 정말 최고야!)

[Verse 3: Mouth]
(The melody is still bright and encouraging)
Ready for the last word?
(마지막 단어 준비됐나요?)

Mouth. Mouth.
입. 입. (ip. ip.)
... (short musical pause)

Let's sing it again!
(다시 한번 불러봐요!)

Mouth. Mouth.
입. 입. (ip. ip.)

Perfect! You learned them all!
(완벽해요! 모두 배웠네요!)

[Outro]
(Music slows down slightly, preparing to end)
Bye bye bye!
See you again!

(Music fades out with a happy final chord)
youtube_description: 얼굴에 있는 '눈', '코', '입'을 배워봐요! 신나는 노래로 우리 몸을 알아가요.
